name: Dungeoneer (itch) (Haeydoth, Warcookie)
description:
Dungeoneer

Jam Theme : It Never Ends

"Lore"

You are a green slime. Green slime is superior over all other slime. Green slime must kill all other slime.

Enemies

Red slime:

This slime is not very hard to eliminate when alone, but when these stack up, it is very hard to escape them.

Yellow slime:

On the first glance, this slime just looks like a Red slime but yellow, but if you wait around for a bit, you'll notice that this slime can shoot slimey bullets just like you! Watch out for this guy.

Blue slime:

This little guy somehow got a piece of a helicopter attached to him, that he's now using to fly past the dangerous lava pits all around the dungeon. This slime is especially dangerous when you've been pushed into a corner, and have nowhere to run.

How to play

Press left click to shoot a slimey bullet.

W = Up

A = Left

S = Down

D = Right

Keep killing enemies until the door at the top of the room opens, so you can proceed to the next room.

Credits

Haydoth

Warcookie

ItsKarma
